phase1_summary: Domain: beverage_preparation; Capability: Coffee Preparation; Use Case: Prepare Milk Coffee; Actors: User (human), Timer (non_human); Temporal Requirements: 7am, at 7, every morning; Excluded: Manual coffee preparation, Bean sourcing and purchasing...
phase2_summary: Analyzed 7 resources from preconditions; Created 7 Manager Controllers; Identified 7 Boundary Objects; Found 8 context-based transformations; Domain: beverage_preparation
